Verses: 1 mose Isravel Puththirarudaiya Koththirangalin Thalaivarai Nokki: Karththar Kattalaiyiduvadhu Ennavendraal:

2 oruvan Karththarukku Yaadhoru Poruththanai Panninaalum, Alladhu Yaadhoru Kaariyaththai Seyyumpadi Aanaiyittuth Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththikkondaalum, Avan Solthavaraamal Than Vaayilirundhu Purappatta Vaakkinpadiyellaam Seyyakkadavan.
3 than Thagappan Veettilirukkira Oru Pen Pillai Than Siruvayadhile Karththarukkup Poruththanaipanni Yaadhoru Kaariyaththai Seyyumpadi Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththikkondaal,

4 aval Seydha Poruththanaiyaiyum, Aval Pannikkonda Nibandhanaiyaiyum Avaludaiya Thagappan Kettum Avalukku Ondrum Sollaadhiruppaanaanaal, Aval Seydha Ellaap Poruththanaigalum Aval Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththikkonda Nibandhanaiyum Niraiveravendum.

5 aval Seydha Poruththanaigalaiyum, Aval Seyyumpadi Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththina Nibandhanaiyaiyum Avaludaiya Thagappan Ketkira Naalile Avan Vendaam Endru Thaduththaal, Adhu Niraiveravendiyadhillai; Avaludaiya Thagappan Vendaam Endru Thaduththapadiyaal, Karththar Adhai Avalukku Mannippaar.
6 aval Poruththanai Pannumpodhum, Than Udhadugalaith Thirandhu Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththikkollumpodhum, Avalukkup Purushan Irundhaal,

7 appozhudhu Avaludaiya Purushan Adhaik Kettirundhum, Adhaik Kelvippadugira Naalile Avalukku Ondrum Sollaadhirundhaal, Avaludaiya Poruththanaigalum Aval Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththina Nibandhanaiyum Niraiveravendum.

8 avaludaiya Purushan Adhaik Ketkira Naalil Avan Vendaam Endru Thaduththu, Aval Seydha Poruththanaiyum Aval Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththikkonda Nibandhanaiyum Sellaadhapadi Seydhaaneyaanaal, Appozhudhu Karththar Adhai Avalukku Mannippaar.
9 oru Vidhavaiyaavadhu, Thallappattuppona Oru Sthreeyaavadhu Than Aaththumaavai Endha Nibandhanaikkutpaduththikkollugiraalo Andha Nibandhanai Niraiveravendum.
10 aval Than Purushanudaiya Veettil Yaadhoru Poruththanai Panninaalum, Alladhu Yaadhoru Kaariyaththai Seyyumpadi Aanaiyittuth Than Aaththumaavai Pandhanaikkutpaduththikkondaalum,

11 avaludaiya Purushan Adhaik Kettum Avalukku Adhai Vendaamendru Thadukkaamal Mavunamaayirundhaal, Aval Seydha Ellaap Poruththanaigalum, Aval Than Aaththumaavai Nibandhanaikkutpaduththina Ellaa Nibandhanaigalum Niraiveravendum.

12 avaludaiya Purushan Avaigalaikketta Naalil Avaigalai Sellaadhapadi Panninaal, Appozhudhu Aval Seydha Poruththanaigalum, Aval Than Aaththumaavaiyutpaduththina Nibandhanaiyaikkuriththu Aval Vaayilirundhu Purappattadhondrum Niraiveravendiyadhillai; Avaludaiya Purushan Avaigalai Sellaadhapadi Panninadhinaale Karththar Adhai Avalukku Mannippaar.
13 endhap Poruththanaiyaiyum Aaththumaavaith Thaazhmaippaduththumpadi Seyyappatta Endha Aanaiyaiyum, Avaludaiya Purushan Sthirappaduththavunkoodum, Sellaadhapadi Pannavum Koodum.

14 avaludaiya Purushan Orunaalum Avalukku Ondrum Sollaadhirundhaanaagil, Avan Avaludaiya Ellaap Poruththanaigalaiyum, Avalperilirukkira Avaludaiya Ellaa Nibandhanaigalaiyum Sthirappaduththugiraan; Avan Adhaik Ketta Naalile Avalukku Ondrum Sollaamar Ponadhinaal, Avaigalai Sthirappaduththugiraan.
15 avan Avaigalaik Kettapinbu Sellaadhapadi Panninaal, Avaludaiya Akkiramaththai Avan Sumappaan Endraar.
16 purushanaiyum Sthreeyaiyum, Thagappanaiyum Thagappanudaiya Veettil Siruvayadhil Irukkira Avan Kumaaraththiyaiyum Kuriththu, Karththar Mosekku Vidhiththa Kattalaigal Ivaigale.
